paragraph: Thomas Knak is a Danish electronic musician who has also produced work under the name Opiate. He worked with Bj√∂rk on her Vespertine album and has produced remixes for Bomb the Bass and Coldcut. He also produced original music for the 2003 Danish film Reconstruction.
